pageProps.content:
Experience

Kapama has a variety of luxurious lodges – all located within the beautiful Kapama Game Reserve in the Greater Kruger region of South Africa: River Lodge, Karula, Buffalo Camp & Southern Camp.
The prestigious Kapama Karula is set on the banks of the Klaserie River, ensuring action-packed game viewing year-round. Only a short drive from Hoedspruit airport, Kapama Karula is the perfect getaway for guests hoping to limit their travel time.

Stay

The lodge comprises 12 superior villas (of which 2 are family villas) – each beautifully decorated & boasting an en-suite bathroom.
Each air-conditioned superior villa is equipped with an outdoor rain shower, fireplace & private deck with a heated pool overlooking the Klaserie River.
The family villas each has en-suite 2 bedrooms, an open-plan living room, a Nespresso coffee machine, a private outdoor deck & a large, heated swimming pool for year-round swimming. The second bedroom is ideal for children since it features a flat-screen TV, a selection of movies & a Wii game console.
The main lodge includes a relaxing open-plan lounge, dining room, bar & sparkling swimming with uninterrupted bushveld views.

Activities

Kapama Karula will take guests on morning & evening safari drives in open 4x4 vehicles. This amazing reserve can also be experienced on foot.
At Kapama, luxury & comfort go hand & hand. Invigorating spa treatments at the wellness spa will allow guests to relax in a remote & tranquil setting with nothing but the sounds of the wild in the background.
Hot air balloon safaris, photographic workshops & romantic sleep-outs can also be arranged at an additional cost.

subfolders.title: Kapama Buffalo Camp
subfolders.description: Kapama has a variety of luxurious lodges – all located within the beautiful Kapama Game Reserve in the Greater Kruger region of South Africa:  River Lodge, Karula, Buffalo Camp & Southern Camp. The tented Kapama Buffalo Camp offers adventurous safaris in a remote & pristine bush setting.  Only a short drive from Hoedspruit airport, Kapama Buffalo Camp is the perfect getaway for guests hoping to limit their travel time. The camp only has 10 luxury safari tents - each built on stilts & connected by wooden walkways to ensure complete privacy.  The tents have fantastic views from amongst the treetops & monkeys often come to visit.  All tents are equipped with en-suite bathrooms.

subfolders.title: Kapama River Lodge
subfolders.description: Kapama has a variety of luxurious lodges – all located within the beautiful Kapama Game Reserve in the Greater Kruger region of South Africa:  River Lodge, Karula, Buffalo Camp & Southern Camp. Kapama River Lodge is the largest private game lodge in the Greater Kruger region, making this the ideal bush retreat for larger groups or families.  Only a short drive from Hoedspruit airport, Kapama River Lodge is the perfect getaway for guests hoping to limit their travel time. Kapama River Lodge comprises 40 standard suites, 16 spa suites, 4 family suites & 2 royal suites.

subfolders.description: Kapama has a variety of luxurious lodges – all located within the beautiful Kapama Game Reserve in the Greater Kruger region of South Africa:  River Lodge, Karula, Buffalo Camp & Southern Camp. The superior Kapama Southern Camp offers luxury 5-star accommodation, warm hospitality & friendly service in a tranquil setting.  Only a short drive from Hoedspruit airport, Kapama Southern Camp is the perfect getaway for guests hoping to limit their travel time. Kapama Southern Camp has 15 standard suites, 7 luxury villas & 3 luxury family villas.
